projects.title: Razzword
projects.name: razzword
projects.desc: Razzword is a small password genertator built with Vue.js. Users can generate a password with the built-in options, save passwords and also copy the generated passwords. Razzword is the first time I have used Vue.js to build a product, it has taught me plenty about the framework. Note: This project is still a work-in-progress.

projects.title: Graphite GTC
projects.name: graphitegtc
projects.desc: Graphite GTC is a no-code development platform. This rebranded site is to promote the Graphite GTC platform. During this project I had the ability to consult on design and content on top of my development duties. During the launch of this project we had a renewed focused on social media initiative. I played a large part in crafting our presence. Post launch of Graphite GTC we used to Google Analytics to do A/B testing on new features.

intro.alt: Graphite GTC home page inside 2015 Mackbook

projects.title: No-Code Conference
projects.name: nocodeconference
projects.desc: No-Code Conference is hosted by Graphite GTC. The conference is to expand no-code development and the Graphite GTC platform. This site was made to promote upcoming events and to register new attendees.

projects.title: Github Search
projects.name: githubsearch
projects.desc: GitHub Search is a small React web app to search and display GitHub users and repos. Use the serach field to find the top 10 users and repos. Expand your search by adjusting the return results.

intro.alt: Github Search home page inside 2015 Mackbook

projects.title: Enterprise Cloudworks
projects.name: enterprisecloudworks
projects.desc: Designed in-house, myself and other designers on the project created the design language for the company. This website is mainly used to promote the company and the services provided by Enterprise Cloudworks.

projects.title: Enterprise Cloudworks Mockup
projects.name: enterprisecloudworks-mockup
projects.desc: Before the intial lunch of the Enterprise Cloudworks, I created this prototype as a mockup for the design direction and hiarchy of the project. After a review, this mockup was put aside for the current design. I created wireframes for the mockup, the design was done in Sketch, I also began organizing design guides.

projects.title: GSW
projects.name: gsw
projects.desc: GSW, a health care marketing agency, rebraded in 2013. Our team developed the site and consulted on the design of the new website. The project was meant to be a simple and informative site but also remain interactive and interesting for the user to navigate through.
